duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate project planning, scheduling, progress tracking, and budget/cost analysis.
Provide reports to project management for decision-making support.
Analyze earned value progress reports to identify and mitigate project risks.
Ensure contractual obligations related to project controls are met.
Manage change management procedures, including cost and schedule tracking.
Assist in developing and maintaining staffing and manpower plans, project budgets, and contract plans.
Provide hands-on training on project controls and supervise project controls specialist(s) as required.
Interface with in-house departments and third parties for invoicing and cost tracking purposes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in engineering or a Business-related major
